title: [Self-Directed] Multimedia Interactive Pedagogy Application Project for Digital Recorder Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic recorder performance skills and digital device utilization abilities
context.additional_context: A language education-linked program for working professionals, integrating Malaysian traditional folk songs into digital recorder educational content to simultaneously acquire cultural understanding and musical instrument skills

learning_goals: Learners can play five Malaysian folk songs on the recorder using digital interactive textbooks
Learners improve their performance accuracy by over 80% through a multimedia feedback system
Learners can explain design principles of digital recorder education content through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
